019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
023import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotUnlinkEvent;
024import com.plotsquared.core.events.Result;
025import com.plotsquared.core.location.Location;
026import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
027import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
028import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
029import com.plotsquared.core.util.EventDispatcher;
030import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
031import com.plotsquared.core.util.StringMan;
032import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.TaskManager;
033import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
034import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
035import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
036import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
037
038@CommandDeclaration(command = "unlink",
039        aliases = {"u", "unmerge"},
040        usage = "/plot unlink [createroads]",
041        requiredType = RequiredType.PLAYER,
042        category = CommandCategory.SETTINGS,
043        confirmation = true)
044public class Unlink extends SubCommand {
045
046    private final EventDispatcher eventDispatcher;
047
048    @Inject
049    public Unlink(final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher) {
050        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public boolean onCommand(final PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
055        Location location = player.getLocation();
056        final Plot plot = location.getPlotAbs();
057        if (plot == null) {
058            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
059            return false;
060        }
061        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
062            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_unowned"));
063            return false;
064        }
065        if (plot.getVolume() > Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
066            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("schematics.schematic_too_large"));
067            return false;
068        }
069        if (!plot.isMerged()) {
070            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.unlink_impossible"));
071            return false;
072        }
073        final boolean createRoad;
074        if (args.length != 0) {
075            if (args.length != 1 || !StringMan.isEqualIgnoreCaseToAny(args[0], "true", "false")) {
076                sendUsage(player);
077                return false;
078            }
079            createRoad = Boolean.parseBoolean(args[0]);
080        } else {
081            createRoad = true;
082        }
083
084        PlotUnlinkEvent event = this.eventDispatcher
085                .callUnlink(plot.getArea(), plot, createRoad, createRoad,
086                        PlotUnlinkEvent.REASON.PLAYER_COMMAND
087                );
088        if (event.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
089            player.sendMessage(
090                    TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
091                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Unlink")))
092            );
093            return true;
094        }
095        boolean force = event.getEventResult() == Result.FORCE;
096        if (!force && !plot.isOwner(player.getUUID()) && !Permissions
097                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND_UNLINK)) {
098            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_plot_perms"));
099            return true;
100        }
101        Runnable runnable = () -> {
102            if (!plot.getPlotModificationManager().unlinkPlot(createRoad, createRoad)) {
103                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.unmerge_cancelled"));
104                return;
105            }
106            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.unlink_success"));
107            eventDispatcher.callPostUnlink(plot, PlotUnlinkEvent.REASON.PLAYER_COMMAND);
108        };
109        if (hasConfirmation(player)) {
110            CmdConfirm.addPending(player, "/plot unlink " + plot.getId(), runnable);
111        } else {
112            TaskManager.runTask(runnable);
113        }
114        return true;
115    }
116
117}
